fullText: Despite its pedigree and star power, 'The Addams Family' feels more tedious than macabre, delivering few genuine laughs and even fewer memorable songs.
dtliExcerpt: Despite its pedigree and star power, 'The Addams Family' feels more tedious than macabre, delivering few genuine laughs and even fewer memorable songs.
